titulo-flota: We tell you about our fleet
descripcion-helicoptero1: American-made helicopter, has become a fundamental part of the aviation industry thanks to its versatility and exceptional performance.
descripcion-helicoptero2: Recognized for its elegant design and panoramic view, this helicopter gives you the opportunity to experience the landscapes of Mendoza from a unique and immersive perspective.
capacidad-helicoptero: Capacity for 2 passengers in addition to the pilot.
